name: Mobile SERP Tracker
description: Real Google mobile SERP results from 4G/5G carrier IPs. Returns structured JSON with organic results, People Also Ask, featured snippets, AI Overviews, map packs, ads, and position tracking.
longDescription: Track Google mobile search rankings with authentic 4G/5G carrier IPs. Get the exact SERP layout mobile users see â€” including mobile-specific features like AI Overviews, People Also Ask, featured snippets, map packs, knowledge panels, and ad placements. Supports country/language targeting and local search. At $0.003/query, undercuts SerpApi ($0.01-0.025) and DataForSEO ($0.002) while providing authentic mobile data that neither offers.
